selects.author: SELECT id from author WHERE name=?
selects.status: SELECT id from status WHERE name=?
selects.project: SELECT id from project WHERE name=?
selects.session: SELECT id from session WHERE session_key=?
selects.updatedTests: SELECT * from test ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?
selects.containsTests: SELECT * from test WHERE id%?=0 LIMIT ?

updateTests: UPDATE test SET status_id=? WHERE id=?
deleteTests: DELETE from test order by id desc limit ?
